description: This file defines a custom exception class 'EntityNotFoundException' which extends a global exception class used in the project. It provides constructors to throw specific exception messages related to missing entities in the database.

classes.name: EntityNotFoundException
classes.description: A custom exception class indicating that a requested entity was not found in the database.

methods.name: EntityNotFoundException()
methods.description: Default constructor that initializes the exception with a standard error message and error code.

methods.name: EntityNotFoundException(String message)
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the exception with a custom message while using a standard error code.
